sep.gaia.resources.poi

Class POIQuery

  • java.lang.Object
    • sep.gaia.resources.Query
      • sep.gaia.resources.poi.POIQuery

  • public class POIQuery
extends Query
    A query describing POIs to be generated by a loader. The set of all POIs in the database used can be restricted by defining a geographical area to search in and limitations to be met by the POIs that should be generated.
    Author:
    Matthias Fisch

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      POIQuery(FloatBoundingBox boundingBox, POIFilter limitations)
      Initializes the query by defining a bounding-box and criteria to be met by the POIs to query.

      Returns the name of the category the POIs resulting from this query are in.

    • Constructor Detail

      • POIQuery

        public POIQuery(FloatBoundingBox boundingBox,
        POIFilter limitations)
        Initializes the query by defining a bounding-box and criteria to be met by the POIs to query.
        Parameters:
        boundingBox - A bounding-box describing the geographical area. All corners must be of the following configuration: (longitude, latitude, 0). Pass null for no geographical restrictions.
        limitations - The conditions the POIs to be retrieved must fulfill. This parameter can be null if all existing POIs in the specified area should be queried.

    • Method Detail

      • getBoundingBox

        public FloatBoundingBox getBoundingBox()
        Returns the geographical area this query is targeting.
        Returns:
        The bounding-box of the area or null if there are no geographical restrictions.

      • setBoundingBox

        public void setBoundingBox(FloatBoundingBox boundingBox)
        Sets the area to target by this query.
        Parameters:
        boundingBox - A bounding-box describing the geographical area. All corners must be of the following configuration: (longitude, latitude, 0). Pass null for no geographical restrictions.

      • getLimitations

        public POIFilter getLimitations()
        Returns the criteria POIs to be retrieved have to fulfill.
        Returns:
        The conditions the POIs to be retrieved must fulfill or null if all existing POIs in the specified area should be queried.

      • setLimitations

        public void setLimitations(POIFilter limitations)
        Sets the criteria to be met by POIs to be queried.
        Parameters:
        limitations - The conditions the POIs to be retrieved must fulfill. This parameter can be null if all existing POIs in the specified area should be queried.

      • getCategoryName

        public java.lang.String getCategoryName()
        Returns the name of the category the POIs resulting from this query are in.
        Returns:
        The name of the category the POIs resulting from this query are in.

      • setCategoryName

        public void setCategoryName(java.lang.String categoryName)
        Sets the name of the category the POIs resulting from this query are in.
        Parameters:
        categoryName - The name of the category the POIs resulting from this query are in.
